binary-obfuscation.title: BinaryObfuscation
binary-obfuscation.description: Extension that captures metadata ont he methods that a binary may be obfuscated with, such as executable packers or XOR encryption. This includes obfuscation of the entire binary as well as its constituent pieces, such as strings.

method.description: Captures the method used in obfuscating the binary. The value for this property SHOULD come from the obfuscation-method-ov vocabulary.

layer_order.description: Captures the ordering of the obfuscation method with respect to other obfuscation methods (if known), as a positive integer. For example, if a binary was packed and then XOR encrypted, the packing layer would have an ordering of "1" and the XOR encryption layer would have an ordering of "2".

encryption_algorithm.description: Captures the name of the encryption algorithm used by the obfuscation method (if applicable). The values for this property SHOULD come from the STIX encryption-algo-ov vocabulary.

packer_name.description: Specifies the name of the packer (if applicable).

packer_version.description: Specifies the version of the packer (id applicable).

packer_entry_point.description: Specifies the entry point address of the packer (if applicable); in hexadecimal.

packer_signature.description: Specifies the matching signature detected for the packer (if applicable).
